Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server

Interface ClientConnectionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GamesHandler
public interface ClientConnectionListener
interface containing the necessary methods to notify the observers of the connection between server and client

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addActiveConnection​(java.lang.String socketId, ClientConnectionHandler connection)
    adds a new connection to the active ones
    void notifyParsingError​(java.lang.String socketId)
    Notifies a parsing error of a received message
    void onMissingPong​(java.lang.String socketId)
    Notifies the listener that a player did not answer to the ping message
    void onReceivedMessage​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String socketId)
    Notifies the listener that a new message was received

  • Method Details

    • onReceivedMessage

      void onReceivedMessage​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String socketId)
      Notifies the listener that a new message was received
      Parameters:
      message - represents the message received
      socketId - represents the sending player's socket id

    • addActiveConnection

      void addActiveConnection​(java.lang.String socketId, ClientConnectionHandler connection)
      adds a new connection to the active ones
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the id associated to the connection
      connection - represents the client's socket connection

    • onMissingPong

      void onMissingPong​(java.lang.String socketId)
      Notifies the listener that a player did not answer to the ping message
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the player's socket id

    • notifyParsingError

      void notifyParsingError​(java.lang.String socketId)
      Notifies a parsing error of a received message
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the id associated to the connection
